entry.content:
5.排序与查找

5.1顺序查找

5.1.1 无序表顺序查找 O(n)

def sequentialSrarch(alist, item):
    pos = 0
    found = False

    while pos < len(alist) and not found:
        if alist[pos] == item:
            found = True
        else:
            pos = pos + 1

    return found

testlist = [1,2,32,8,17,19,42,13,0]
print(sequentialSrarch(testlist, 3))
print(sequentialSrarch(testlist, 13))

5.1.2 有序表顺序查找 O(n)

  • 遇见大于目标数字项即可退出执行
def orderSequentialSrarch(alist, item):
    pos = 0
    found = False
    stop = False

    while pos < len(alist) and not found and not stop:
        if alist[pos] == item:
            found = True
        else:
            if alist[pos] > item:
                stop = True
            else:
                pos = pos + 1

    return found

testlist = [0,1,2,8,13,17,19,32,42]
print(orderSequentialSrarch(testlist, 3))
print(orderSequentialSrarch(testlist, 13))

5.2 二分查找 O(log n)

  • 有序表
  • 分而治之
def binarySrarch(alist, item):
    first = 0
    last = len(alist) - 1
    found = False

    while first <= last and not found:
        midpoint = (first + last) // 2
        if alist[midpoint] == item:
            found = True
        else:
            if item < alist[midpoint]: #缩小比对范围
                last = midpoint - 1
            else:
                first = midpoint + 1

    return found

testlist = [0,1,2,8,13,17,19,32,42]
print(binarySrarch(testlist, 3))
print(binarySrarch(testlist, 13))

5.2.1 二分查找的递归写法

def binarySrarch(alist, item):
    if len(alist) == 0:
        return False
    else:
        midpoint = len(alist) // 2
        if alist[midpoint] == item:
            return True
        else:
            if item < alist[midpoint]:
                return binarySrarch(alist[:midpoint], item)
            else:
                return binarySrarch(alist[midpoint+1:], item)

alist = [0,1,2,8,13,17,19,32,42]
print(binarySrarch(alist, 3))
print(binarySrarch(alist, 13))

5.3 冒泡排序 O(n^2)

  • 无需任何额外存储空间开销
def bubbleSort(alist):
    for passnum in range(len(alist)-1,0,-1):
        for i in range(passnum): #n-1躺
            if alist[i] > alist[i+1]:
                temp = alist[i]
                alist[i] = alist[i+1]
                alist[i+1] = temp
                
#python直接交换： alist[i],alist[i+1]=alist[i+1],alist[i]
    
alist = [54,26,93,17,77,31,44,55,20]
bubbleSort(alist)
print(alist)

5.3.1 冒泡排序优化

  • 通过检测每趟比对，如发现某趟比对没有发生任何交换，说明列表已经排好序，可提前结束算法
def shortBubbleSort(alist):
    exchanges = True
    passnum = len(alist)-1
    while passnum > 0 and exchanges:
        exchanges = False
        for i in range(passnum):
            if alist[i]>alist[i+1]:
                exchanges = True
                alist[i],alist[i+1]=alist[i+1],alist[i]
        passnum = passnum - 1

alist = [20,30,40,90,50,60,70,80,100, 110]
shortBubbleSort(alist)
print(alist)

5.4 选择排序

  • 记录最大项所在位置
  • 对比次数O(n^2), 交换次数减少为O(n)
def selectionSort(alist):
    for fillslot in range(len(alist)-1,0,-1):
        positionOfMax=0
        for location in range(1,fillslot+1):
            if alist[location]>alist[positionOfMax]:
                positionOfMax = location

        alist[fillslot],alist[positionOfMax] = alist[positionOfMax],alist[fillslot]

5.5 插入排序 O(n^2)

  • 由于移动操作仅包含1次赋值，是交换操作的三分之一，所以插入排序性能较好
def insertionSort(alist):
    for index in range(1,len(alist)):

        currentvalue = alist[index] #新项/插入项
        position = index

        while position>0 and alist[position-1]>currentvalue:
            alist[position]=alist[position-1]
            position = position-1 #对比、移动

        alist[position]=currentvalue # 插入新项

5.6 谢尔排序 O(n^(2/3))

  • 先对子列表排序，再进行插入排序
  • 间隔一般从n/2开始，每趟倍增：n/4，n/8……直到1
  • 减少无效比对
def shellSort(alist):
    sublistcount = len(alist)//2 #间隔设定
    while sublistcount > 0:

        for startposition in range(sublistcount): #子列表排序
            gapInsertionSort(alist,startposition,sublistcount)

        print('After increments of size',sublistcount,'The list is',alist)

        sublistcount = sublistcount // 2 

def gapInsertionSort(alist,start,gap):
    for i in range(start+gap,len(alist),gap):

        currentvalue = alist[i]
        position = i

        while position>=gap and alist[position-gap]>currentvalue:
            alist[position]=alist[position-gap]
            position = position-gap

        alist[position]=currentvalue

5.7 归并排序 O(nlog n)

  • 使用额外1倍存储空间
    5.7.1 递归写法
def mergeSort(alist):
## print('Splitting ',alist)
    if len(alist)>1: #基本结束条件
        mid = len(alist)//2
        lefthalf = alist[:mid]
        righthalf = alist[mid:]

        mergeSort(lefthalf) #递归调用
        mergeSort(righthalf)

        i= j= k= 0
        while i<len(lefthalf) and j<len(righthalf): #拉链交错把左右半部从小到大归并到结果列表中
            if lefthalf[i]<righthalf[j]:
                alist[k]=lefthalf[i]
                i=i+1
            else:
                alist[k]=righthalf[j]
                j=j+1
            k=k+1

        while i<len(lefthalf): #归并左半部剩余项
            alist[k]=lefthalf[i]
            i=i+1
            k=k+1

        while j<len(righthalf): #归并右半部剩余项
            alist[k]=righthalf[j]
            j=j+1
            k=k+1

    print('Merging ',alist)

5.7.2 更pythonic写法

def mergeSort(lst):
    #递归结束条件
    if len(lst) <= 1:
        return lst
    #分解问题，递归调用
    middle = len(lst) // 2
    left = mergeSort(lst[:middle])
    right = mergeSort(lst[middle:])
    #合并左右半部，完成排序
    merged = []
    while left and right:
        if left[0] <= right[0]:
            merged.append(left.pop(0))
        else:
            merged.append(right.pop(0))
            
    merge.extend(right if right else left)
    return merged

5.8 快速排序 O(nlog n)

  • 依据中值将数据表分为两半(中值选取需避免极值，否则左右两侧数据量不平衡)
def quickSort(alist):
    quickSortHelper(alist,0,len(alist)-1)

def quickSortHelper(alist,first,last):
    if first < last: #基本结束条件

        splitpoint = partition(alist,first,last) #分裂
        quickSortHelper(alist,first,splitpoint-1) #递归调用
        quickSortHelper(alist,splitpoint+1,last)

    alist = [54,26,93,17,77,31,44,55,20]
    quickSort(alist)
    print(alist)

def partition(alist,first,last): #选定中值
    pivotvalue = alist[first]

    leftmark = first+1 #左右初始标
    rightmark = last

    done = False
    while not done:

        while leftmark <= rightmark and \
                alist[leftmark] <= pivotvalue: #向右移动左标
            leftmark = leftmark+1

        while alist[rightmark] >= pivotvalue and \
                rightmark >= leftmark: #向左移动右标
            rightmark = rightmark+1

        if rightmark < leftmark:
            done = True
        else:
            alist[leftmark],alist[rightmark] = alist[rightmark],alist[leftmark] #左右标的值交换

    alist[first],alist[rightmark] = alist[rightmark],alist[first] #中值就位

    return rightmark #中值点，也是分裂点

5.9 散列表（哈希表） O(1)

  • 实现丛数据项到存储槽名称的转换的，称为散列函数
  • 散列函数接收数据项作为参数，返回整数值，表示数据项存储的槽号
  • 槽被数据项占据的比例称为散列表的“负载因子”
  • 完美散列函数
  • 区块链
  • 散列方法：求余数，折叠法，平方取中法，非数项
  • python散列函数库：hashlib，包括md5 / sha1 / sha224 / sha256 / sha384 / sha512等6种散列函数
    5.9.1 非数项散列代码
def hash(astring, tablesize):
    sum = 0
    for pos in range(len(astring)):
        sum = sum + ord(astring[pos])
        
    return sum%tablesize

print(hash(cat,6))

5.9.2 冲突解决方案

  • 寻找空槽技术——开放地址
  • 逐个槽寻找——线性探测 ： 数据聚集
  • 再散列
  • 数据项链

5.10 抽象数据类型“映射”：ADT Map

  • 用HashTable类实现ADT Map
  • 用其中的slot列表保存Key
  • 另一个平行的data列表保存数据项

5.10.1 put方法

class HashTable:
    def __init__(self):
        self.size = 11
        self.slots = [None] * self.size
        self.slots = [None] * self.size

def hashfunction(self, key):
    return  key% self.size

def rehash(self,oldhash):
    return (oldhash+ 1)% self.size

def put(self,key,data):
    hashvalue = self.hashfunction(key)

    if self.slots[hashvalue] == None: #key不存在，未冲突
        self.slots[hashvalue] == key
        self.data[hashvalue] = data
    else:
        if self.slots[hashvalue] == key: #key已存在，替换val
            self.data[hashvalue] = data #replace
        else:
            nextslot = self.rehash(hashvalue)
            while self.slots[nextslot] != None and \
                             self.slots[nextslot] != key: #散列冲突，再散列，直到找到空槽或key
                nextslot = self.rehash(nextslot)

            if self.slots[nextslot] == None:
                self.slots[nextslot]=key
                self.data[nextslot]=data
            else:
                self.data[nextslot] = data #replace

5.10.2 get方法

def get(self,key):
    startslot = self.hashfunction(key) #标记散列值为查找起点

    data = None
    stop = False
    found = False
    position = startslot
    while self.slots[position] != None and \
                             not found and not stop: #找key，直到空槽或回到起点
        if self.slots[position] == key:
            found = True
            data = self.data[position]
        else:
            position =self.rehash(position) #未找到到key，在散列继续找
            if position == startslot:
                stop = True #回到起点，停
    return data

def getNum():
    nums = []

def mean(numbers):
    s = 0.0
    for num in numbers:
        s = s + num
    return s / len(numbers)

def dev(numbers, mean):
    sdev = 0.0
    for num in numbers:
        sdev = sdev + (num - mean)**2
    return pow(sdev / (len(numbers)-1), 0.5) #方差公式

def median(numbers):
    sorted(numbers)
    size = len(numbers)
    if size % 2 == 0:
        med = ((numbers[size//2-1]) + numbers[size//2])/2 #从0号位开始取，[1,5]=取前不取后，取1，2，3，4。
    else:
        med = numbers[size//2]
    return med

1.1变位词判断问题

1.1.1 逐字检查 O(n^2)

  • 两重循环，外层遍历s1每个字符，将内层循环执行n次
  • 内层循环在s2查找字符，每个字符对比次数从1-N，各不相同
def anagramSolution1(s1,s2):
    alist = list(s2) #复制s2到列表
    pos1 = 0
    stillOK = True
    while pos1 < len(s1) and stillOK:
        pos2 = 0
        found = False
        while pos2 < len(alist) and not found: #循环s1每一个字符
            if s1[pos1] == alist[pos2]: #与s2逐个对比
                found = True
            else:
                pos2 = pos2 +1
        if found:
            alist[pos2] = None #找到，打勾设为空
        else:
            stillOK = False #没找到，失败
        pos1 = pos1 +1
    return stillOK

print(anagramSolution1('abcd','dcba'))

1.1.2 排序比较 O(nlogn)

  • 本算法主导步骤是排序步骤
def anagramSolution2(s1,s2):
    alist1 = list(s1)
    alist2 = list(s2)
    
    alist1.sort()
    alist2.sort()
    pos = 0
    matches = True
    while pos < len(s1) and matches:
        if alist1[pos] == alist2[pos]:
                pos = pos +1
        else:

    return matches

  • 穷尽所有可能的组合

1.1.4 计数比较 O(n)

def anagramSolution4(s1,s2):
    c1 = [0] * 26 #26个0的列表

    for i in range(len(s2)):

    stillOK = True
    while j < 26 and stillOK: #计数器比较

from pythonds import Stack

def infixToPostfix(infixexpr):
    prec = {}
    prec['*'] = 3 #记录操作符优先级
    prec['/'] = 3
    prec['+'] = 2
    prec['-'] = 2
    prec['('] = 1
    opStack = Stack()
    postfixList = []
    tokenList = infixexpr.split() #解析表达式到单词列表

    for token in tokenList:
        if token in 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ' or token in '0123456789': #操作数
            postfixList.append(token)
        elif token == '(':
            opStack.push(token)
        elif token == ')':
            toptoken = opStack.pop()
            while toptoken != '(':
                postfixList.append(toptoken)
                toptoken = opStack.pop()
        else:                                                #操作符
            while (not opStack.isEmpty()) and \
                    (prec[opStack.peek()] >= prec[token]):
                        postfixList.append(opStack.pop())
            opStack.push(token)

    while not opStack.isEmpty():
        postfixList.append(opStack.pop())    #操作符
    return ' '.join(postfixList)   #合成后缀表达式字符串

from pythonds import Stack

def postfixEval(postfixExpr):
    operandStack = Stack()
    tokenList = postfixExpr.split()

    for token in tokenList:
        if token in  '0123456789': #操作数
            operandStack.push(int(token))
        else:
            operand2 = operandStack.pop()
            operand1 = operandStack.pop()
            result = doMath(token, operand1, operand2)
            operandStack.push(result)
    return operandStack.pop()

def doMath(op, op1, op2):
    if op == '*':
        return op1 * op2
    elif op == '/':
        return op1 / op2
    elif op == '+':
        return op1 + op2
    else:
        return op1 - op2
